snippet.title: VOIN gameplay trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Here's a brand new trailer for first-person hack-and-slash adventure VOIN, as revealed in the Convergence Showcase. You'll be able to fight hordes of enemies, explore the world of dark fantasy filled with secrets and dangers, and master your skill of wielding primordial elements.

Wishlist it today, and try the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2464530/VOIN/

#convergenceshow #indiegame
